title: What happened in the year 1836? - Quora

response.answer_text: Congressman/frontiersman David “Davy” Crockett died at age 49 on 3–6–1836. “Before Abraham Lincoln was born, I AM.” Davy declared at his execution (seen only pierced, after the Alamo battle, executed by bayonet). “You’re not even 50 years old, and you’ve seen Abraham !”, the Mexican soldiers mocked and scoffed.  “I want to warn you all…I’m a screamer”
